incidents.name: SMS Delivery Delays and Failures to Cingular Wireless AT&T in US Over a  Subset of Longcodes.

incident_updates.body: Twilio SMS was degraded for 5 minutes between 12:30 and 12:35 Pacific Time on 04/10/2025. During this period of time customers may have experienced SMS delivery delays and failures to Cingular Wireless AT&T in the US Over a subset of longcodes. The issue has now been resolved.

incidents.name: Meta Template Approval Webhook Delivery Failure

incident_updates.body: There is currently a bug in Meta's systems that is causing a delay in template status change event delivery. There will be a delay for the time it takes for a template approval to be reflected in Twilio's systems. Customers may see a discrepancy in the template status between Meta and Twilio during this delay. Twilio will continue to monitor the situation while Meta resolves the issue. We will provide another update in 24 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

There is currently a bug in Meta's systems that is causing a delay in template status change event delivery. Our monitoring systems have detected a potential issue with WhatsApp messaging. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We will update as soon as we have more information.

incidents.name: "Automated Alert: Minimal Customer Impact"

incident_updates.body: We have fully investigated the API errors on the transcript retrieval issue, and it was determined that the impact was limited to a small set of customers, who have been contacted individually to address any concerns. All systems are operational.

We are currently investigating an elevated rate of HTTP 500 errors for API errors on Transcript retrieval. Our engineers are working on the issue, and we will provide another update in one hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

incidents.name: Delays in Conversations SDK and Sync SDK real-time data updates

incident_updates.body: From around 01:42 UTC to 01:52 UTC, customers using the Conversations SDK and Sync SDK may have experienced temporary delays in real-time updates on subscribed SDK objects. The issue has been mitigated and real-time updates to SDKs have been restored.

Customers across all support plans are encountering issues with Live Chat—after sending a message, they need to refresh the thread in order to continue the conversation. Paid support and Personalized support customers were unaffected. This issue was resolved on April 1, 2025 at approximately 12:00 PM PST.

incidents.name: Message Status Event Steams Issue

incident_updates.body: Message Status Event Steams events were degraded on 2nd April 2025 between 06:30 AM UTC and 08:10 AM UTC. During this period of time customers may have not received ~3.6% of status updates for outbound messages through Event Streams. The issue has now been resolved.

Our monitoring systems have detected a potential issue with a subset of Event Streams events failing. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We will update as soon as we have more information.
